Columns.Description: The time (UTC) when this event was generated
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: The time this ingest operation failed
Columns.Name: FailedOn

Columns.Description: The name of the database holding the target table
Columns.Name: Database

Columns.Description: The name of the target table the data is ingested into
Columns.Name: Table

Columns.Description: The ID of the ingestion source
Columns.Name: IngestionSourceId

Columns.Description: Final state of this data ingestion operation like 'Failed'
Columns.Name: ResultType

Columns.Description: The ingestion's activity ID Used for debugging issues
Columns.Name: RootActivityId

Columns.Description: Indicates if the failure originates from an Update Policy
Columns.Name: OriginatesFromUpdatePolicy

Columns.Description: Indicates if the failure is temporary and the operation should be retried
Columns.Name: ShouldRetry

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
